post:
It's a new year, and we have a new service location! New Jersey! We decided to use this location because of its proximity to Quebec and the eastern United States. Our New Jersey servers run Intel E3 processors and RAID 1 storage with a 100mbit shared connection. We’ve also added ability to manage reverse DNS inside SolusVM at our New Jersey location. IPv6 is also coming soon.

Here is a special New Year’s LET offer:
**LET-512**
2 CPU cores
512mb RAM - 768mb Burst RAM
30GB Disk Space
New Jersey Only
1Tb bandwidth
1IPv4 address
https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=103 
$5.75/month (other payment cycles available)

OR 

Use promo code **newyears2013** on any of our regular packages for 35% off reoccurring.

Need more information? http://www.supremebytes.com/virtual-private-servers.php 

Refunds are granted case by case. Normally we will issue refunds depending on the amount of resources already used.

Location: New Jersey
OpenVZ with SolusVM Management
Test server (OVZ-128): http://vpstest-nj.supremebytes.com or http://vpstest-nj.supremebytes.com/bigtest.tgz
Payments: PayPal, 2Checkout

SupremeBytes, LLC - A Columbus, Ohio Company.
